entities.name: morfin
entities.description: Morfin is described as a Squib, implying he has no magical abilities. He is also referred to as 'disgusting' and 'filthy', indicating his behavior is considered unacceptable.

entities.name: gaunt
entities.description: Gaunt is described as losing control and attacking his daughter, Merope. He is also referred to as a 'blood traitor', implying he has committed some kind of treachery.

entities.name: merope
entities.description: Merope is described as being attacked by her father, Gaunt. She screams for help, indicating she is in distress.

entities.name: ogden
entities.description: Ogden is described as intervening to protect Merope from her father's attack. He uses magic to defend himself and others.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as reacting to the situation by yelling 'No!' and following Dumbledore's lead in pursuing Gaunt.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is described as indicating that they should follow Gaunt, implying he has some knowledge of what is happening or will happen.

entities.name: squib
entities.description: The term 'Squib' refers to a person born to magical parents but with no magical abilities themselves.

relationships.description: Ogden uses magic to defend himself against Gaunt's attack.
Dumbledore indicates that Harry should follow him in pursuing Gaunt.
Ogden intervenes to protect Merope from her father's attack.
Morfin attacks Ogden with a knife and hexes.
